activities:
Sift Science, Inc. (“Sift Science”, “we” or “us”) helps online businesses (our “Clients”) detect and address fraud and other malicious behavior on their digital properties. In doing so, we collect information about how Internet users (“Users”) interact with our Clients’ digital properties such as their websites and mobile applications (their “Sites”). 

Pursuant to providing our Service, and as described in our Service Privacy Notice, we collect or otherwise obtain certain personal information from those Sites including but not limited to email addresses, postal addresses, user login name or other unique customer identifiers and telephone numbers. We also obtain the device identifiers, IP Addresses, and on-line customer transaction data of Users who visit those Sites. We also obtain certain personal information via our Website as described in our Website Privacy Notice.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational and Client data as disclosed in our privacy policy
